audience: These development modules are for aspiring, new and experienced leaders and managers.

courses.title: Leading and managing in adult social care

audience: These development modules are for aspiring, new and experienced leaders and managers.

groupTitle: Digital learning for CQC inspection preparation
audience: These development modules are for new managers, new providers, quality & compliance leads and others preparing for CQC inspection and those within or helping CQC regulated services recover from falling below national standards

groupTitle: Creating an inclusive organisation digital learning modules
audience: These development modules are primarily for frontline workers from diverse ethnic backgrounds but may be of interest to anyone at any level who is interested in equality, diversity and inclusion.

courses.title: Module 2 – Leadership development and career progression

groupTitle: Digital learning for Care Certificate Assessors
audience: This learning programme is for individuals who will be assessing the Care Certificate in the workplace.

courses.title: Digital Leadership Programme
courses.description: Registered Managers will engage in a Digital Leadership Programme consisting of 4 modules.

courses.title: Leading Change Improving Care
courses.description: Registered managers and service managers will participate in Leading Change Improving Care, a program consisting of 5 modules.

courses.title: Lead to Succeed
courses.description: Aspiring and deputy managers will take part in the Lead to Succeed program, comprising 5 modules.

courses.title: Moving up
courses.description: Team leaders, deputy managers, managers, supervisors, care coordinators, and commissioners from diverse ethnic backgrounds will advance their skills through the Moving up program, including 4 self-learning modules and 3 live sessions.

courses.title: New Directors
courses.description: New or aspiring directors with statutory responsibility will participate in the New Directors program, spanning 6 days.

courses.title: Understanding performance management
courses.description: Registered managers and service managers will enhance their skills in Understanding Performance Management through a single module.

courses.title: Understanding self-management skills
courses.description: Registered managers and service managers will gain insights into Understanding Self-Management Skills through a single module.

courses.title: Understanding workplace culture
courses.description: Registered managers and service managers will explore Understanding Workplace Culture through a single module.

courses.title: Well-led
courses.description: Registered managers and service managers will be part of the Well-led program, consisting of 4 modules.

courses.title: Mental Health First Aid
courses.totalLearningTime: 14 hours of content, delivered as 4 live sessions

courses.title: PBS Foundation level
courses.totalLearningTime: 120 learning hours (24 taught), excludes hours of prior levels

courses.title: PBS Intermediate level
courses.totalLearningTime: 240 learning hours (48 taught), progressive – building on foundation

courses.title: PBS Advanced level
courses.totalLearningTime: 360 learning hours (72 taught), progressive – building on intermediate
